button.clickHereToProposeAdding: Click here to propose adding it.
button.stakeAllButProposalDeposit: Stake all but the {{proposalDeposit}} ${{tokenSymbol}} proposal deposit

CwdProposalSingle.advancedWarning: These are advanced features. Threshold and quorum can interact in counterintuitive ways. If you configure them without fully understanding how they work, you can lock your DAO, making it impossible for proposals to pass.

CwdVotingCw20Staked.description: Fluid organization with many members who can join and leave as they wish. Members can alter their governance power and participation by exchanging tokens.
CwdVotingCw20Staked.name: Token-based DAO

CwdVotingCw4.description: Small organization with a few members who are likely to stick around. Members can be added and removed by a vote of existing members.
CwdVotingCw4.name: Membership DAO (Multisig)

error.cannotStakeMoreThanYouHave: You can't stake or unstake more tokens than you have.
error.cannotTxZeroTokens: You can't stake, unstake, or claim zero tokens.
error.cantSpendMoreThanTreasury: Can't spend more tokens than are in the treasury ({{amount}} ${{tokenSymbol}}).
error.checkInternetOrTryAgain: Check your internet connection or try again later.
error.connectWalletToCreate: Connect a wallet to create a DAO.
error.couldntFindDAO: We couldn't find a DAO with that address. Search DAOs on the <2>home page</2>.
error.couldntFindProposal: We couldn't find a proposal with that ID. See all proposals on the <2>DAO's home page</2>.
error.createProposalSubmitInvalid: Correct the errors above before previewing or publishing.
error.daoIsPaused: You cannot create a proposal when the DAO is paused.
error.descriptionTooLong: A DAO's description must be less than or equal to {{max}} characters long.
error.errorOccurredOnPage: An error occurred on this page.
error.failedToGetTokenInfo: Failed to get token info. Please enter a valid CW20 contract address.
error.govTokenBalancesDoNotSumTo100: Total token distribution percentage must equal 100%, but it currently sums to {{totalPercent}}.
error.invalidDuplicateFound: Invalid. Duplicate found in other list.
error.mustBeMemberToCreateProposal: You must be a member of the DAO to create a proposal.
error.nameIncorrectLength: A DAO's name must be between {{min}} and {{max}} characters.
error.noCw20Tokens: There are no CW20 tokens in the treasury.
error.noMembers: You haven't added any members to your DAO.
error.noVotingPower: You have not given anyone voting power. Add some members to your DAO.
error.notCw20Address: This contract address is not a CW20 token.
error.notCw721Address: This contract address is not a NFT (CW721).
error.notEnoughForDeposit: You do not have enough tokens in your balance to pay the proposal deposit
error.notInActiveSet: This validator is not in the active set. No rewards will be earned while this is the case.
error.pfpkStargazeReopenModal: Failed to connect to Stargaze. Reopen the modal to try again.
error.simulationFailedInvalidProposalActions: Simulation failed. Verify your proposal actions are valid.
error.stakeInsufficient: The DAO has {{amount}} ${{tokenSymbol}} staked, which is insufficient.
error.treasuryInsufficientCannotStake: The treasury only has {{amount}} ${{tokenSymbol}}, which is insufficient.
error.treasuryNoTokensCannotStake: The treasury has no ${{tokenSymbol}}, so you can't stake any tokens.

form.allowRevotingDescription: This will allow members to change their vote on proposals before the voting duration deadline. As a result, proposals will not be able to finish early.
form.automaticallyAddNFTsTooltip: Should NFTs sent to the DAO get added to the treasury?
form.automaticallyAddTokensTooltip: Should tokens sent to the DAO get added to the treasury?
form.governanceTokenNamePlaceholder: Longer name of your token (e.g. "Dog Dao token")
form.imageURLTooltip: A link to an image. For example: https://moonphase.is/image.svg
form.migrateDescription: This will <1>migrate</1> the selected contract to a new code ID.
form.name: Name
form.onlyMembersExecuteTooltip: If enabled, only members may execute passed proposals.
form.passingThresholdDescription: If your DAO has no quorum set, this is the percentage of the DAO's voting power that must vote 'yes' for a proposal to pass. For example, with a 50% passing threshold, half of the voting power must be in favor of a proposal to pass it. If your DAO has a quorum set, the passing threshold is only calculated from those who voted. For example, with a quorum of 50% and a passing threshold of 50%, a proposal could pass with only 25% of the total voting power having voted 'yes.' A majority passing threshold is recommended.
form.percentOfTotalSupplyTooltip: {{weight}} of the total token supply will be split evenly among all of the members in this tier. Want to add members with different voting power? Add another tier.
form.proposalDepositDescription: The number of tokens that must be deposited to create a proposal. Setting this may deter spam, but setting it too high may limit broad participation.
form.quorumDescription: The minimum percentage of voting power that must vote on a proposal for it to be considered. For example, in the US House of Representatives, 218 members must be present for a vote. If you have a DAO with many inactive members, setting this value too high may make it difficult to pass proposals.
form.refundFailedProposalsTooltip: Should failed proposals have their deposit refunded?
form.refundPolicyTitle: Once a proposal completes, when should deposits be refunded?
form.requireProposalDepositTooltip: If enabled, requires that tokens are deposited to create a proposal.
form.tierNameTooltip: The "class" of member. For example: "Core developers" or "friends and family." These names are only for your reference.
form.unstakingDurationDescription: In order to vote, members must stake their tokens with the DAO. Members who would like to leave the DAO or trade their governance tokens must first unstake them. This setting configures how long members have to wait after unstaking their tokens for those tokens to become available. The longer you set this duration, the more sure you can be sure that people who register their tokens are keen to participate in your DAO's governance.
form.updateAdminDescription: This will update the admin for the selected contract. The new admin will have complete control over the contract. Take care.
form.updateProposalSubmissionConfigDescriptio: This will update the proposal submission configuration for this DAO. A bad configuration can lock the DAO. Take care. If you have questions, please feel free to ask in the <2>DAO DAO Discord</2>.
form.updateVotingConfigDescription: This will update the voting configuration for this DAO. A bad configuration can lock the DAO or create unexpected voting outcomes. Take care. If you have questions, please feel free to ask in the <2>DAO DAO Discord</2>.
form.votingDurationDescription: The amount of time proposals are open for voting. A low proposal duration may increase the speed at which your DAO can pass proposals. Setting the duration too low may make it difficult for proposals to pass as voters will have limited time to vote. After this time elapses, the proposal will either pass or fail.
form.votingWeightPerMemberTooltip: Each member of this tier will receive {{weight}} voting power. Want to add members with different voting power? Add another tier.

info.addCw20ToTreasuryActionDescription: Display the DAO's balance of a CW20 token in the treasury view.
info.addCw721ToTreasuryActionDescription: Display the NFTs owned by the DAO from a CW721 NFT collection in the treasury view.
info.availableHistoryLoaded: All available history has been loaded.
info.chooseNftProfilePictureSubtitle: Use one of your Stargaze NFTs to represent your identity on DAO DAO. Your Keplr profile image will be used as a backup if available.
info.claimToReceiveUnstaked: Claim them to receive your unstaked tokens.
info.configureWalletModalExplanation:
You have Keplr installed, but it doesn't seem like you've set up a wallet. To continue, open the Keplr extension and set up a wallet.
To open the Keplr extension, press the puzzle icon in the top right of your browser and then press the Keplr button. Once you've done that, a new page will open where you'll be able to create a new account. Configure your wallet to continue.
info.createADaoDescription: Create a new project, organization, or community organized the way you want.
info.createStep1: Pick a DAO type and name it
info.customActionDescription_dao: Perform any custom action a wallet can.
info.daoCreationProcessExplanation: Creating your DAO has never been this easy:
info.daoInfoWillRefresh: DAO information may take up to {{minutes}} minutes to update on all pages once proposal is executed.
info.depositNftsModalSubtitle: Select the NFTs you want to deposit into {{daoName}} from your Stargaze wallet.
info.depositTokenSubtitle: Tokens will be sent from your wallet.
info.draftStillSaved: The draft will still be saved.
info.easilyShareLink: Easily share a link by copying it below.
info.enterNameBeforeSavingDraft: Enter a name before saving a draft
info.executeSmartContractActionDescription: Execute a message on a smart contract.
info.keplrModalWalletExplanation:
Your wallet is your digital identity on the blockchain. Having one lets you interact with web3 applications like DAO DAO.
We recommend the Keplr wallet.
info.manageMembersActionDescription: Add, update, or remove members from the DAO.
info.manageSubDaosActionDescription: Recognize or remove SubDAOs from the DAO.
info.membershipDaoNotMemberInfo_dao: You are not a member of {{daoName}}. To become a member, existing members must vote to add you.
info.membershipDaoNotMemberInfo_proposal: You were not a member of {{daoName}} when this proposal was created, so you cannot vote on it.
info.migrateSmartContractActionDescription: Migrate a CosmWasm contract to a new code ID.
info.name: Name
info.newMemberExplanation: To add a new member, the DAO must pass a proposal.
info.noDaosPinnedYet: You have not yet pinned any DAOs.
info.noProposalsYet: No proposals to vote on yet.
info.notAdmin: Your DAO is not the admin of this contract. The proposal will not be executable while this is the case.
info.openProposalsInInbox_one: There is {{count}} open proposal in your inbox.
info.openProposalsInInbox_other: There are {{count}} open proposals in your inbox.
info.preReleaseExplanation: This is a pre-release version of DAO DAO running on the {{chain}} chain.
info.proposalAllAbstainClarification: When all voters abstain, a proposal will fail.
info.proposalDepositWillBeRefunded: Proposal deposit will be refunded once closed.
info.proposalQuorumTooltip: This proportion of voting power must vote on a proposal for it to pass.

proposalStatus.notOpen: This proposal is no longer open for voting. {{turnoutPercent}} of all votes were cast, and {{turnoutYesPercent}} of them were 'Yes'.{{extra}}
proposalStatus.willFail: If the current vote stands, this proposal will fail.
proposalStatus.willFailBadQuorum: If the current vote stands, this proposal will fail due to a lack of voter participation.
proposalStatus.willFailBadThreshold: If the current vote stands, this proposal will fail because insufficient 'Yes' votes have been cast.
proposalStatus.willPass: If the current vote stands, this proposal will pass.

info.proposalThresholdTooltip: A proposal must attain this proportion of 'Yes' votes to pass.
info.recognizeSubDaoDescription: Recognizing {{name}} as a SubDAO will display it inside the SubDAOs tab.
info.removeCw20FromTreasuryActionDescription: Stop displaying the DAO's balance of a CW20 token in the treasury view.
info.removeCw721FromTreasuryActionDescription: Stop displaying the NFTs owned by the DAO from a CW721 NFT collection in the treasury view.
info.spendActionDescription_dao: Spend native or CW20 tokens from the treasury.
info.spendActionDescription_wallet: Spend native tokens from your wallet.
info.stakeYourTokensToJoin: Stake your ${{tokenSymbol}} tokens to become a member of {{daoName}}.
info.subDaoExplanation: SubDAOs are children DAOs that help manage groups within your DAO.
info.subDaoNeedsAdding: {{parent}} has not yet recognized {{child}} as a SubDAO.
info.submitUpgradeProposal: Submit a proposal to upgrade the DAO?
info.tierMemberGovTokenAllocationTooltip: This member will receive {{tokens}} ${{tokenSymbol}} when the DAO is created.
info.tokenDaoNotMemberInfoProposal: You were not a member of {{daoName}} when this proposal was created, so you cannot vote on it. You will be able to vote on future proposals as long as you have ${{tokenSymbol}} staked at the time those proposals are created.
info.tos: DAO DAO TOOLING IS PROVIDED "AS IS", AT YOUR OWN RISK, AND WITHOUT WARRANTIES OF ANY KIND. No developer or entity involved in creating the DAO DAO UI or smart contracts will be liable for any claims or damages whatsoever associated with your use, inability to use, or your interaction with other users of DAO DAO tooling, including any direct, indirect, incidental, special, exemplary, punitive or consequential damages, or loss of profits, cryptocurrencies, tokens, or anything else of value.
info.treasuryBalanceDescription: {{numberOfTokensMinted, number}} tokens will be minted. {{memberPercent}} will be sent to members according to the distribution below. The remaining {{treasuryPercent}} will go to the DAO's treasury, where they can be distributed later via governance proposals.
info.unstakingMechanics: It will take {{humanReadableTime}} from the time you unstake your tokens before they are able to be redeemed by you. During that time, you will not receive staking rewards. You will not be able to cancel the unbonding.
info.updateContractAdminActionDescription: Update the CosmWasm level admin of a smart contract.
info.updateInfoActionDescription: Update your DAO's name, image, and description.
info.updateProposalSubmissionConfigActionDesc: Update the proposal submission paramaters for your DAO.
info.updateVotingConfigActionDescription: Update the voting parameters for your DAO.
info.votingModuleAdapterCreationDiscord: Want to help us support this voting module? Join the <2><0>DAO DAO Discord</0><1/></2> and post in #dao-help.
info.votingModuleNotYetSupported: This DAO uses a voting module that our UI does not yet support. Functionality may be limited.
info.votingPowerAtCreationTooltip: This was your voting power at the time of proposal creation.
info.walletConnectMobileLimitations: Feel free to explore the UI. Due to current limitations in WalletConnect, you will not be able to connect your mobile wallet to the {{chain}} chain.
info.wouldYouLikeToSearchQuestion: Would you like to search for a DAO?

splash.anyoneCanParticipate: Anyone from your community can be a full participant.
splash.easyToUseExplanation: DAO DAO's visual interface makes governance accessible to everyone.
splash.footerBeta: DAO DAO is currently in beta. Please let the developers know if you encounter any issues.
splash.longTagline: Simple, capable, and free DAO tooling. Built with love, by DAO DAO, on Juno.
splash.transparencyExplanation: Anyone can see what decisions your DAO made, and who voted for and against them.
splash.whatIsADaoExplanation: A DAO is an organization democratically controlled by its members.
